posts.author: MonkeyBusinessDM
posts.content:

When DMing, I like to use options as a way to create interesting challenges for my players.

posts.author: BarbarianBob
posts.content:
When DMing, I like to use options as a way to create interesting challenges for my players.

Our table uses a house rule for options where we allow more flexibility in how it's applied. It's been working well so far.
